name: redolent
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
smelling strongly of something or having qualities (especially smells) that make you think of something else: The album is a heartfelt cry, redolent of a time before radio and television. The mountain air was redolent with the scent of pine needles. Synonyms
evocative
reminiscent of someone/something formal
